description: Equipped with the same comfort, warmth and quality as adult boots, the lightweight, flexible Baffin Young Eiger snow boots allow kids to take on winter hikes and recess play in any weather.

techSpecs.name: Type of Waterproofing
values: Waterproof base, waterproof materials and construction

techSpecs.name: Upper
values: Ripstop heavyweight nylon upper with locking snow cuff/collar

techSpecs.name: Lining
values: Removable Comfort-Fit multilayer, foam-based inner boot system

featuredSpecs.name: Upper
values: Ripstop heavyweight nylon upper with locking snow cuff/collar

features: Multilayer, foam-based removable liners coupled with weather- and windproof uppers provide all day protection from the elements
Feature a removable Comfort-Fit multilayer inner boot system
Formfitting B-Tek Foam linings boost comfort
Double B-Tek Heat lightweight, 4-channel, hollow-fiber insulation provides good warmth
Vaporized Aluminum Membrane outermost liner layer keeps the heat in and the cold out
PolyWool polyester/wool-blend layer provides breathable warmth
Hydromax moisture chamber manages moisture to help keep feet dry
Diamond Net insulation provides wind-resistant protection
Waffle-comb footbeds trap warm air and help control odors
Vaporized Aluminum Membrane insoles offer an additional layer of heat retention
Polar Rubber Outsoles maintain pliability even in the coldest temperatures
Double hook-and-loop straps allow easy fastening
Polar rating (-76°F) represents the warmest product offering from Baffin
product.description: Equipped with the same comfort, warmth and quality as adult boots, the lightweight, flexible Baffin Young Eiger snow boots allow kids to take on winter hikes and recess play in any weather.

product.sellingCopy: Comfort Range is an approximate value based on high activity levels and can be affected by many conditions, including weather, wearer's activity level, fitness, metabolism, perspiration, circulation, exposure time, clothing and cold sensitivity.
